articles.description: As Ye is dropped by corporations and condemned by industry figures, sources say that while he has a large stash of cash, he also has vast expenses.
articles.content:
Kanye West could be just months from financial catastrophe, Page Six is told.

articles.title: Kanye West Claims He's Been 'Beat To A Pulp' After Losing $1 Billion In Deals - NDTV
articles.description: Kanye Omari West, the American Rapper has recently claimed that he's been "beat to a pulp" after numerous brands ended partnerships with him.
articles.content:
Kanye West has lost $1 billion in deals as a result of his anti-Semitic meltdown.
